text:
Brie Bella became a new mom days ago, and already friends are showering her & hubby Daniel Bryan with love. Revealing to us EXCLUSIVELY just how thrilled she is for Brie, WWE star Natalya Neidhart gushed about how ‘spoiled’ baby Birdie is going to be, AND that she thinks Daniel will be the diaper king!

At over 41 weeks pregnant, Brie Bella, 33, FINALLY gave birth to her and her husband Daniel Bryan‘s(real name Bryan Danielson,) 35, first child on May 9! The two welcomed daughter Birdie Joe Danielson into the world at 11:58 p.m., and already they’re completely in love with the little angel. SO in love in fact that fellow WWE Superstar Natalya Neidhart, 34, is already predicting Birdie will be one adorably spoiled child!

“I’m so happy for Brie! She’s wanted to be a mom her whole life and now her dreams are finally coming true,” Natalya revealed to HollywoodLife.com EXCLUSIVELY. “She and Bryan are going to make amazing parents and it’s going to be such an exciting, new journey for them!” Of course the athlete couldn’t help mentioning the couple’s newborn daughter, who she happens to think is already a daddy’s girl.”Birdie is going to be so loved and so spoiled,” Natalya continued. “I somehow have a feeling Bryan will be on diaper duty a lot!” LOL.

Although competitors in the ring, Natalya and Brie are friends IRL, and we love how excited she is for her fellow Total Divas star! After all, Natalya IS right, Brie’s wanted to have a child for quite a while now. She even told Fit Pregnancy magazine earlier this year that becoming pregnant was “one of the greatest moments” of her life!

“When I saw the positive — you know, I’m an athlete — it felt like I had won a championship! It took my breath away. I screamed out to tell Bryan,” she gushed to the publication. We can totally see Daniel being an amazing dad too, and we hope Natalya’s right — the athlete on diaper duty sounds WAY too precious.

Tell us, HollywoodLifers, can you too see Daniel on diaper duty a lot? Are you excited to see Birdie’s first pic?
title: Natalya Neidhart ‘So Happy’ For New Mom Brie Bella: Predicts ‘Diaper Duty’ For Daniel Bryan
